mapper.select:
SELECT PROJ_FLOW, PROJ_YEAR, PROJ_NAME, PROJ_SHORT_NAME, PROJ_DECLARER, PROJ_SHORT_DECLARER, PROJ_CATEGORY_ID, PROJ_CATEGORY_NAME, PROJ_NO, CFDA_NO, PROJ_TYPE_ID, PROJ_TYPE_NAME, PROJ_SUB_TYPE_ID, PROJ_SUB_TYPE_NAME, PROJ_STAGE_ID, PROJ_STAGE_NAME, PROJ_STATUS_ID, PROJ_STATUS_NAME, APPLY_USER_FLOW, APPLY_USER_NAME, APPLY_ORG_FLOW, APPLY_ORG_NAME, APPLY_DEPT_FLOW, APPLY_DEPT_NAME, PROJ_START_TIME, PROJ_END_TIME, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW,PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_NAME FROM PDSCI.PUB_PROJ WHERE (RECORD_STATUS = '${proj.recordStatus}' and PROJ_CATEGORY_ID = '${proj.projCategoryId}' and PROJ_STAGE_ID = '${proj.projStageId}'
and proj_name like '%${proj.projName}%'
and proj_year = '${proj.projYear}'
and proj_type_id = '${proj.projTypeId}'
and proj_year >= '${startYear}'
and proj_year <= '${endYear}'
and APPLY_DEPT_FLOW = '${proj.applyDeptFlow}'
and proj_category_id = '${proj.projCategoryId}'
and proj_second_source_id = '${proj.projSecondSourceId}'
and proj_declarer_flow = '${proj.projDeclarerFlow}'
and subj_Name like '%${proj.subjName}%'
and apply_user_name like '%${proj.applyUserName}%'
and apply_org_flow='${orgFlow}' and ( proj_status_id= '${status1}' or (charge_org_flow <> '${chargeOrgFlow}' and proj_status_id= '${status2}') or (charge_org_flow='${chargeOrgFlow}' and proj_status_id= '${status3}') )
and apply_org_flow = '${proj.applyOrgFlow}'
and charge_org_flow='${chargeOrgFlow}' and (proj_status_id= '${status1}' or proj_status_id= '${status2}')
and (proj_status_id='${status1}' or (proj_status_id='${status2}' and charge_org_flow='${chargeOrgFlow}'))
and charge_org_flow='${proj.chargeOrgFlow}'
and apply_org_flow='${proj.applyOrgFlow}'
) ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT PROJ_FLOW, PROJ_YEAR, PROJ_NAME, PROJ_SHORT_NAME, PROJ_DECLARER, PROJ_SHORT_DECLARER, PROJ_CATEGORY_ID, PROJ_CATEGORY_NAME, PROJ_NO, account_No,CFDA_NO, PROJ_TYPE_ID, PROJ_TYPE_NAME, PROJ_SUB_TYPE_ID, PROJ_SUB_TYPE_NAME, PROJ_STAGE_ID, PROJ_STAGE_NAME, PROJ_STATUS_ID, PROJ_STATUS_NAME, APPLY_USER_FLOW, APPLY_USER_NAME, APPLY_ORG_FLOW, APPLY_ORG_NAME, APPLY_DEPT_FLOW, APPLY_DEPT_NAME, PROJ_START_TIME, PROJ_END_TIME, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW ,PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_NAME,PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_ID FROM PDSCI.PUB_PROJ WHERE (RECORD_STATUS = '${proj.recordStatus}' and PROJ_CATEGORY_ID = '${proj.projCategoryId}' and PROJ_STAGE_ID = '${proj.projStageId}'
and proj_name like '%${proj.projName}%'
and proj_year = '${proj.projYear}'
and proj_year >= '${startYear}'
and proj_year <= '${endYear}'
and APPLY_DEPT_FLOW = '${proj.applyDeptFlow}'
and PROJ_DECLARER_FLOW = '${proj.projDeclarerFlow}'
and PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_ID = '${proj.projSecondSourceId}'
and account_No like '%${proj.accountNo}%'
and PROJ_NO like '%${proj.projNo}%'
and proj_type_id = '${proj.projTypeId}'
and proj_category_id = '${proj.projCategoryId}'
and subj_Name like '%${proj.subjName}%'
and apply_user_name like '%${proj.applyUserName}%'
and apply_org_flow='${orgFlow}' and ( proj_status_id= '${status1}' or (charge_org_flow <> '${chargeOrgFlow}' and proj_status_id= '${status2}') or (charge_org_flow='${chargeOrgFlow}' and proj_status_id= '${status3}') )
and apply_org_flow = '${proj.applyOrgFlow}'
and charge_org_flow='${chargeOrgFlow}' and (proj_status_id= '${status1}' or proj_status_id= '${status2}')
and (proj_status_id='${status1}' or (proj_status_id='${status2}' and charge_org_flow='${chargeOrgFlow}'))
and charge_org_flow='${proj.chargeOrgFlow}'
and apply_org_flow='${proj.applyOrgFlow}'
) ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT PROJ_FLOW, PROJ_YEAR, PROJ_NAME, PROJ_SHORT_NAME, PROJ_DECLARER, PROJ_SHORT_DECLARER, PROJ_CATEGORY_ID, PROJ_CATEGORY_NAME, PROJ_NO, account_No,CFDA_NO, PROJ_TYPE_ID, PROJ_TYPE_NAME, PROJ_SUB_TYPE_ID, PROJ_SUB_TYPE_NAME, PROJ_STAGE_ID, PROJ_STAGE_NAME, PROJ_STATUS_ID, PROJ_STATUS_NAME, APPLY_USER_FLOW, APPLY_USER_NAME, APPLY_ORG_FLOW, APPLY_ORG_NAME, APPLY_DEPT_FLOW, APPLY_DEPT_NAME, PROJ_START_TIME, PROJ_END_TIME, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW FROM PDSCI.PUB_PROJ WHERE (RECORD_STATUS = '${proj.recordStatus}' and PROJ_CATEGORY_ID = '${proj.projCategoryId}'
and PROJ_STAGE_ID = '${proj.projStageId}'
and proj_name like '%${proj.projName}%'
and proj_year = '${proj.projYear}'
and account_No like '%${proj.accountNo}%'
and PROJ_NO like '%${proj.projNo}%'
and proj_year >= '${startYear}'
and proj_year <= '${endYear}'
and APPLY_DEPT_FLOW = '${proj.applyDeptFlow}'
and proj_type_id = '${proj.projTypeId}'
and subj_Name like '%${proj.subjName}%'
and apply_user_name like '%${proj.applyUserName}%'
and PROJ_DECLARER_FLOW = '${proj.projDeclarerFlow}'
and PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_ID = '${proj.projSecondSourceId}'
and apply_org_flow='${orgFlow}'
and ( proj_status_id= '${status1}' or (charge_org_flow <> '${chargeOrgFlow}' and proj_status_id= '${status2}') or (charge_org_flow='${chargeOrgFlow}' and proj_status_id= '${status3}') )
AND (EXISTS (SELECT null FROM PDSCI.PUB_PROJ_REC PPR WHERE PUB_PROJ.PROJ_FLOW = PPR.PROJ_FLOW AND PPR.REC_TYPE_ID='${recTypeId}' AND PPR.RECORD_STATUS='Y'
and PPR.PROJ_STAGE_ID='${proj.projStageId}'
and PPR.PROJ_STATUS_ID='${proj.projStatusId}'
AND ( PPR.PROJ_STATUS_ID in ('${status1}', '${status2}','${status3}'))
)))
and apply_org_flow = '${proj.applyOrgFlow}'
and charge_org_flow='${chargeOrgFlow}' and (proj_status_id= '${status1}' or proj_status_id= '${status2}') AND (EXISTS (SELECT null FROM PDSCI.PUB_PROJ_REC PPR WHERE PUB_PROJ.PROJ_FLOW = PPR.PROJ_FLOW AND PPR.REC_TYPE_ID='${recTypeId}' AND PPR.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and PPR.PROJ_STAGE_ID='${proj.projStageId}' AND (PPR.PROJ_STATUS_ID in ('${status1}' , '${status2}')))))
and (proj_status_id='${status1}' or (proj_status_id='${status2}' and charge_org_flow='${chargeOrgFlow}'))
and charge_org_flow='${proj.chargeOrgFlow}'
and apply_org_flow='${proj.applyOrgFlow}'
AND (EXISTS (SELECT null FROM PDSCI.PUB_PROJ_REC PPR WHERE PUB_PROJ.PROJ_FLOW = PPR.PROJ_FLOW AND PPR.REC_TYPE_ID='${recTypeId}' AND PPR.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and PPR.PROJ_STAGE_ID='${proj.projStageId}' AND (PPR.PROJ_STATUS_ID in ('${status1}' , '${status2}')))))
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT PROJ_FLOW, PROJ_YEAR, PROJ_NAME, PROJ_SHORT_NAME, PROJ_DECLARER, PROJ_SHORT_DECLARER, PROJ_CATEGORY_ID, PROJ_CATEGORY_NAME, PROJ_NO, account_No,CFDA_NO, PROJ_TYPE_ID, PROJ_TYPE_NAME, PROJ_SUB_TYPE_ID, PROJ_SUB_TYPE_NAME, PROJ_STAGE_ID, PROJ_STAGE_NAME, PROJ_STATUS_ID, PROJ_STATUS_NAME, APPLY_USER_FLOW, APPLY_USER_NAME, APPLY_ORG_FLOW, APPLY_ORG_NAME, APPLY_DEPT_FLOW, APPLY_DEPT_NAME, PROJ_START_TIME, PROJ_END_TIME, RECORD_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, CREATE_USER_FLOW, MODIFY_TIME, MODIFY_USER_FLOW FROM PDSCI.PUB_PROJ WHERE (RECORD_STATUS = '${proj.recordStatus}' and PROJ_CATEGORY_ID = '${proj.projCategoryId}'
and PROJ_STAGE_ID = '${proj.projStageId}'
and proj_name like '%${proj.projName}%'
and proj_year >= '${startYear}'
and proj_year <= '${endYear}'
and APPLY_DEPT_FLOW = '${proj.applyDeptFlow}'
and proj_year = '${proj.projYear}'
and account_No like '%${proj.accountNo}%'
and PROJ_NO like '%${proj.projNo}%'
and proj_type_id = '${proj.projTypeId}'
and proj_category_id = '${proj.projCategoryId}'
and subj_Name like '%${proj.subjName}%'
and apply_user_name like '%${proj.applyUserName}%'
and PROJ_DECLARER_FLOW = '${proj.projDeclarerFlow}'
and PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_ID = '${proj.projSecondSourceId}'
and apply_org_flow='${orgFlow}'
and ( proj_status_id= '${status1}' or (charge_org_flow <> '${chargeOrgFlow}' and proj_status_id= '${status2}') or (charge_org_flow='${chargeOrgFlow}' and proj_status_id= '${status3}'))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT null FROM PDSCI.PUB_PROJ_REC PPR WHERE PUB_PROJ.PROJ_FLOW = PPR.PROJ_FLOW AND PPR.REC_TYPE_ID='${recTypeId}' AND PPR.RECORD_STATUS='Y'
and PPR.PROJ_STAGE_ID='${proj.projStageId}'
and PPR.PROJ_STATUS_ID='${proj.projStatusId}'
AND (PPR.PROJ_STATUS_ID in ('${status1}' , '${status2}' ,'${status3}'))
)))
and apply_org_flow = '${proj.applyOrgFlow}'
and charge_org_flow='${chargeOrgFlow}' and (proj_status_id= '${status1}' or proj_status_id= '${status2}') AND (EXISTS (SELECT null FROM PDSCI.PUB_PROJ_REC PPR WHERE PUB_PROJ.PROJ_FLOW = PPR.PROJ_FLOW AND PPR.REC_TYPE_ID='${recTypeId}' AND PPR.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and PPR.PROJ_STAGE_ID='${proj.projStageId}' AND (PPR.PROJ_STATUS_ID in ('${status1}' , '${status2}')))))
and (proj_status_id='${status1}' or (proj_status_id='${status2}' and charge_org_flow='${chargeOrgFlow}'))
and charge_org_flow='${proj.chargeOrgFlow}'
and apply_org_flow='${proj.applyOrgFlow}'
AND (EXISTS (SELECT null FROM PDSCI.PUB_PROJ_REC PPR WHERE PUB_PROJ.PROJ_FLOW = PPR.PROJ_FLOW AND PPR.REC_TYPE_ID='${recTypeId}' AND PPR.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and PPR.PROJ_STAGE_ID='${proj.projStageId}' AND (PPR.PROJ_STATUS_ID in ('${status1}' , '${status2}')))))
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC

SELECT
FROM PDSCI.PUB_PROJ
AND EXISTS (SELECT null FROM ( SELECT so.org_flow FROM PDSCI.sys_org so START WITH so.org_flow=#{orgFlow} CONNECT BY PRIOR so.org_flow=so.CHARGE_ORG_FLOW) t1 WHERE PUB_PROJ.apply_org_flow=t1.org_flow) AND (EXISTS (SELECT null FROM PDSCI.PUB_PROJ_REC WHERE
PROJ_STATUS_ID=#{_statusEnumIdForEditing} AND
PROJ_STATUS_ID!=#{statusEnumIdForNoSearch1} and PROJ_STATUS_ID!=#{statusEnumIdForNoSearch2} AND
rec_type_id=#{recTypeId} AND PUB_PROJ.PROJ_FLOW = PROJ_FLOW)) ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC

select proj_flow ,account_No, PROJ_NO,proj_year,PROJ_DECLARER,proj_stage_id, proj_stage_name,proj_status_id, proj_status_name,proj_type_id , proj_type_name , proj_start_time , proj_end_time , proj_name , apply_user_flow , apply_user_name , apply_org_flow , apply_org_name from PDSCI.pub_proj where RECORD_STATUS='Y'
and proj_year >= '${startYear}'
and proj_year <= '${endYear}'
and APPLY_DEPT_FLOW = '${applyDeptFlow}'
and PROJ_STAGE_ID=#{projStageId}
and account_No like '%${accountNo}%'
and PROJ_NO like '%${projNo}%'
and proj_category_id=#{projCategoryId}
and PROJ_STATUS_ID=#{projStatusId}
and PROJ_DECLARER_FLOW = '${projDeclarerFlow}'
and PROJ_SECOND_SOURCE_ID = '${projSecondSourceId}'
and PROJ_YEAR=#{projYear}
and PROJ_TYPE_ID=#{projTypeId}
and PROJ_NAME LIKE '%${projName}%'
and APPLY_ORG_FLOW = '${applyOrgFlow}'
and CHARGE_ORG_FLOW = '${chargeOrgFlow}'
and SUBJ_NAME like '%${subjName}%'
and APPLY_USER_NAME like '%${applyUserName}%'

select proj_flow , proj_year ,proj_stage_id, proj_stage_name,proj_status_id, proj_status_name,proj_type_id , proj_type_name , proj_start_time , proj_end_time , proj_name , apply_user_flow , apply_user_name , apply_org_flow , apply_org_name from PDSCI.pub_proj where RECORD_STATUS='Y' and PROJ_CATEGORY_ID='ky'
and PROJ_YEAR=#{proj.projYear}
and PROJ_TYPE_ID=#{proj.projTypeId}
and PROJ_NAME LIKE '%${proj.projName}%'
and APPLY_ORG_FLOW = '${proj.applyOrgFlow}'
and CHARGE_ORG_FLOW = '${proj.chargeOrgFlow}'
and subj_Name like '%${proj.subjName}%'
and apply_user_name like '%${proj.applyUserName}%'
AND (EXISTS (SELECT null FROM PDSCI.PUB_PROJ_PROCESS PPP WHERE PUB_PROJ.PROJ_FLOW = PPP.PROJ_FLOW AND PPP.PROJ_STAGE_ID=#{stage} AND PPP.PROJ_STATUS_ID=#{status}))

select count(*) projCount,so.org_name orgName,so.org_flow orgFlow from PDSCI.SRM_EXPERT_PROJ_EVAL segp,PDSCI.pub_proj pp,PDSCI.sys_org so where segp.proj_flow=pp.proj_flow and so.ORG_FLOW=pp.apply_org_flow
and so.org_flow in (select org_flow from PDSCI.sys_org start WITH org_flow=#{orgFlow} connect by prior org_flow=charge_org_flow)
group by so.org_name,so.org_flow

select count(*) projCount
,so.charge_org_name orgName,so.charge_org_flow orgFlow
,so.org_name orgName,so.org_flow orgFlow
from PDSCI.sys_org so,PDSCI.pub_proj pp
,PDSCI.pub_proj_process ppp
where pp.apply_org_flow=so.org_Flow
and ppp.proj_stage_id=#{projStageId}
and pp.proj_category_id=#{projCategoryId}
and ppp.proj_status_id=#{projStatusId}
and ppp.proj_flow=pp.proj_Flow
and so.charge_org_flow
and so.org_flow
in (select org_flow from sys_org
where level='2'
start WITH org_flow=#{orgFlow} connect by prior org_flow=charge_org_flow)
group by so.charge_org_name,so.charge_org_flow
group by so.org_name,so.org_flow

select
from PDSCI.PUB_PROJ where record_status='Y'
and (PROJ_SHORT_NAME like #{keyword} or PROJ_NO like #{keyword} )
and APPLY_ORG_FLOW = #{applyOrgFlow}
order by NLSSORT(PROJ_SHORT_NAME,'NLS_SORT = SCHINESE_PINYIN_M')
select * from PDSCI.PUB_PROJ where RECORD_STATUS='Y' and (proj_status_id = #{projStatusId} or proj_stage_id = #{projStageId}) ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC, PROJ_START_TIME DESC, PROJ_END_TIME

select t1.org_flow orgFlow , t1.org_name orgName , nvl(t2.projCount , 0) projCount from ( select org_flow , org_name from PDSCI.sys_org where org_flow not in (select distinct charge_org_flow from PDSCI.sys_org where charge_org_flow is not null) and record_status='Y'
and charge_org_flow='${proj.chargeOrgFlow}'
) t1 left join ( select apply_org_flow , count(apply_org_flow) projCount from pub_proj where
((proj_stage_id='Apply' and proj_status_id!='Apply') or proj_stage_id!='Apply')
proj_stage_id!='Apply'
proj_no is not null
proj_stage_id='Approve' and proj_status_id='NotApprove'
and proj_type_id='${proj.projTypeId}'
and pub_proj.PROJ_YEAR='${proj.projYear}'
and charge_org_flow='${proj.chargeOrgFlow}'
and proj_category_id = '${proj.projCategoryId}'
group BY apply_org_flow) t2 on t1.org_flow = t2.apply_org_flow

select pp.APPLY_ORG_FLOW orgflow, count(*) num from pub_proj pp , pub_proj_rec ppr where pp.PROJ_FLOW=ppr.PROJ_FLOW and pp.PROJ_CATEGORY_ID='ky' and pp.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and ppr.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and ppr.REC_TYPE_ID=#{recTypeId} and ppr.PROJ_STATUS_ID=#{status} group by pp.APPLY_ORG_FLOW
